name: Design Supply
overview:
Set up in 1991 by Alistair Wright and Ian Stapleton, we were originally dedicated to supplying drawing office products purely to the Architectural and Design markets.

As they watched the world of large format grow larger still, however, they saw the opportunity to reposition themselves - which they did in 2001 - and since then, they have specialised in providing wide format printing solutions to a diverse customer base.

Design Supply is now a Value Added Reseller for Hewlett-Packard, a Pro Focus dealer for Epson and an authorised large format reseller for Canon.

In terms of key stats, they now have a customer base of 1700, 2000 square feet of warehousing, 1500 square feet of office space and also a turnover of Â£3.5 million.

offices.address1: Unit 2, Green Lane Business Park, 238 Green Lane
